title: SpaceX fires up Starship and Super Heavy booster hours apart
summary: SpaceX appears to have successfully fired up a Starship and Super Heavy booster hours apart, testing a total of three new Raptor...

title: Canada’s MDA eyes UK expansion
summary: Canada’s MDA sees a growing opportunity to expand its international space business from the United Kingdom, where it plans to double its team to 80 employees in the next 12 months.

title: Lockheed Martin’s venture fund to increase investments in space companies
summary: Lockheed Martin Ventures is increasing investments by $200 million and much of that will be focused on the space domain

title: Orbital Insight and Asterra join forces to monitor infrastructure
summary: Orbital Insight announced plans Aug. 9 to work with Israeli startup Asterra to jointly provide remote sensing analytics to water utilities, infrastructure organizations and other industries.

title: SpaceX loses $900 million in rural broadband subsidies
summary: SpaceX has lost its bid for nearly $900 million in rural broadband subsidies for its Starlink broadband service.
